ygData.subject: RE: New instrument?!
ygData.msgSnippet: does sound fishy.  all of the other magical instruments (mistmoore battle drums, selo s drum of march) only add to the songs, don t give stat boosts as well.
ygData.messageBody:
does sound fishy. all of the other magical instruments (mistmoore battle
drums, selo's drum of march) only add to the songs, don't give stat boosts
as well. would be nice though. something this good would probably have to
come off cazic-thule or a dragon though. now we need a bard-only weapon!

Shada
Battle Bard


> From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
>
> almost sounds like a hoax, it just seems too good to be true,
> dex boost and
> the charisma boost... and the brass 15%.
>
> i'll beleive it when i have one in my hands, untill then i
> will treat this
> thing as a hoax
>
> Minkin Nehoc
> Solusek Ro
>
